# zipbomb_LA6cXnuHysBLTK

## Usage

Simply use 
```bash
pip install pip_combined.zip
```
and check the storage consumption in the `/tmp` folder. It'll consume about 64GB space before it's finished.

$ ls -l pip_combined.zip
